articles.author: Samuel Axon
articles.title: Are any of Apple’s official MagSafe accessories worth buying? - Ars Technica
articles.description: When MagSafe was introduced, it promised an accessories revolution. Meh.

articles.author: Tim Schiesser
articles.title: Don't Buy a GPU Now: Wait for Next-Gen or Grab a Discount? - TechSpot
articles.description: Wondering if now's the time to upgrade your GPU? With key announcements and next-gen GPUs just weeks away, waiting is the smarter strategy than jumping on holiday sales.
articles.content: It's the holiday shopping season, and that means many of you are likely considering a new graphics card purchase perhaps at a discount or as an upgrade to play the latest games, like Stalker 2, becau… [+13780 chars]
